alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:52PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cache and northeastern Box Elder Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 452 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Snowville, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Snowville, Plymouth, Howell, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Portage, Washakie, Locomotive Springs and Curlew Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 391 and 400. Interstate 84 between mile markers 1 and 32. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 66 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
